Name: Dralmorrer Borngray

Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, prestidigitation, shocking grasp1st level (4 slots): longstrider, magic missile, shield, thunderwave2nd level (2 slots): magic weapon, misty step War Magic. When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack. Weapon Bond.
